metadata.title: AI-Enhanced ML-FAANG Mastery Plan
metadata.description: 20-week comprehensive roadmap for ML researchers transitioning to FAANG software engineering roles with AI-powered learning assistance

week.title: Final Optimization + Interview Excellence
objectives: Achieve peak performance on advanced algorithms and system design
Validate final readiness through comprehensive assessments and mock interviews
Master strategies for consistency, confidence, and performance under pressure
Obtain final AI certification of interview excellence

morning_session.title: Peak Performance Optimization
activities: Peak performance optimization with AI-guided excellence coaching
AI explanation of final preparation strategies and confidence maximization
Performance consistency optimization with AI variance reduction techniques

problems.name: Constrained Subsequence Sum
problems.description: Advanced dynamic programming with deque optimization
problems.ai_prompt: How does constrained optimization relate to feature selection and regularization in ML models?

problems.name: Shortest Distance from All Buildings
problems.ai_prompt: How does multi-source optimization relate to distributed computing and federated learning architectures?

problems.name: Data Stream as Disjoint Intervals
problems.description: Real-time interval merging with efficient updates
problems.ai_prompt: How does interval management relate to time-series segmentation and anomaly detection in streaming data?

problems.name: Merge Intervals
problems.ai_prompt: How does interval merging relate to time series data processing?

problems.name: Insert Interval
problems.ai_prompt: How does interval insertion relate to incremental learning?

evening_session.title: Peak Performance Interview
activities: AI Mock Interview: Peak performance interview with AI-guided excellence training
Study final optimization techniques and performance maximization strategies
Plan comprehensive final preparation with AI excellence coaching

morning_session.title: Final Readiness Assessment
activities: Comprehensive readiness assessment with AI-guided evaluation
AI explanation of certification criteria and excellence validation
Final optimization checklist with AI comprehensive review

problems.name: Maximum Gap
problems.description: Linear time sorting with bucket sort optimization
problems.ai_prompt: How does linear time optimization relate to efficient data processing and scalable ML pipeline design?

problems.name: Longest Substring with At Most K Distinct Characters
problems.description: Advanced sliding window with constraint tracking
problems.ai_prompt: How does constrained optimization relate to regularization and controlled model complexity in ML?

problems.name: Paint House III
problems.ai_prompt: How does multi-dimensional cost optimization relate to resource allocation and efficiency in ML training?

evening_session.title: Final Certification Interview
activities: Final Certification Interview: AI comprehensive evaluation
AI analysis of complete readiness and final optimization recommendations
Plan final week with AI strategic excellence guidance

morning_session.title: Performance Validation
activities: Peak performance validation with AI-guided consistency optimization
AI explanation of performance reliability and variance minimization
Confidence optimization and mental preparation with AI coaching

problems.name: Peak Performance Challenge
problems.description: Multiple hard problems with AI optimization
problems.ai_prompt: Tackle a set of 3 diverse, hard problems under timed conditions. Use AI coaching to refine your approach on the fly.

problems.name: Consistency Validation
problems.description: Repeated problem solving with AI performance tracking
problems.ai_prompt: Re-solve 3 hard problems from previous weeks. Use AI to compare your current solution with your past attempts and measure improvement.

evening_session.title: Consistency Interview
activities: Consistency Interview: AI performance reliability validation
Study performance optimization and consistency maintenance techniques
Advanced excellence training with AI performance coaching

morning_session.title: Final System Integration
activities: Final system integration with AI-guided holistic optimization
AI explanation of complete interview readiness and excellence certification
Comprehensive skill validation with AI assessment

problems.name: System Integration Challenge
problems.description: Complete technical skill demonstration with AI validation
problems.ai_prompt: Design a system that requires integrating multiple algorithmic components you've mastered (e.g., a real-time analytics dashboard using sliding windows, heaps, and tries).

problems.name: Excellence Certification Task
problems.description: AI comprehensive evaluation across all dimensions
problems.ai_prompt: Undergo a final AI-driven evaluation that tests your coding speed, solution quality, and system design skills in a single, integrated session.

evening_session.title: Excellence Certification
activities: Excellence Certification: Final AI validation of complete readiness
Study final preparation techniques and optimization strategies
Plan final preparation week with AI strategic guidance

morning_session.title: Complete Readiness
activities: Complete readiness validation with AI final assessment
AI explanation of final optimization and peak performance maintenance
Confidence maximization and mental preparation with AI coaching

problems.name: Final Excellence Test
problems.description: Complete skill validation with AI assessment
problems.ai_prompt: A final, comprehensive test covering the most challenging problems and system design scenarios from the entire 15-week curriculum.

problems.name: Readiness Confirmation
problems.ai_prompt: Receive your final AI-generated readiness report and certification, highlighting your strengths and confirming your FAANG-level capabilities.

evening_session.title: Final Readiness Validation
activities: Final Readiness Validation: Complete AI assessment and certification
AI analysis of complete interview excellence and final recommendations
Weekend planning for final week preparation and interview execution

saturday.title: Portfolio Project: Intelligent Job Scheduling Platform
saturday.description: Build a sophisticated job scheduling platform using interval algorithms and optimization techniques for managing complex ML training workflows, batch processing, and resource allocation in distributed computing environments.

problems.name: Meeting Rooms III
problems.description: Advanced interval scheduling with resource constraints

problems.name: Employee Free Time
problems.description: Complex interval merging and gap finding

tasks: Implement interval-based scheduling algorithms for optimal resource utilization and job placement.
Create conflict resolution system using advanced interval merging and splitting techniques.
Build priority-based job queue management with deadline optimization and dependency handling.
Design distributed workflow orchestration using interval graphs for complex ML pipeline coordination.
saturday.deliverable: A production-ready job scheduling platform with web interface, real-time monitoring, and comprehensive analytics dashboard.

sunday.title: ML System Study: Airbnb's Search and Ranking Infrastructure
sunday.description: Analyze Airbnb's search and ranking infrastructure, focusing on how interval algorithms optimize availability searches, pricing calculations, and real-time inventory management for millions of listings worldwide.
tasks: Study how Airbnb uses interval algorithms for real-time availability searches across date ranges.
Analyze dynamic pricing systems and how interval-based calculations optimize revenue per booking.
Research inventory management algorithms and how they handle overlapping reservations and cancellations.
Implement a mini booking system using interval algorithms from your scheduling platform.
sunday.deliverable: Technical analysis of Airbnb's search infrastructure with working prototype of interval-based booking system.
